data.text:
@karenosstf OMG, enough is enough! Get the life, Karen! For the sake of kids STOP your liberal propaganda! You party ruined enough lives! 
#unmaskkids
#nomandatesforkids
#fightforkidsfuture https://t.co/txZ3FH1F0e
@Scott71666980 @karenosstf How have they made things worse in your classroom, Scott?
@karenosstf Covid was done long ago. Let it go...
@MairiBew @karenosstf The masks have never helped. They actually make things worse. Let's get back to life without fear. 💯🙏👍
@karenosstf Science says masks don’t work. Omg stop with the fear mongering.
@karenosstf If you don't think your members are safe in their workplaces shouldn't you do something about it?
@karenosstf Please fight for us to be able to keep wearing our masks a little longer!
@karenosstf @Poleconomist What are union reps for OSSTF gonna do about it?
@karenosstf Ford doesn’t care. No real data since they suppressed testing. Moore is a man of the money, not the science.
